name: Drought Royale V0.5
description:
Open a few tabs or grab a friend to play multiplayer! There is a downloadable build at the bottom of the page if the WebGL is  laggy (don't forget to try other browsers, safari is known to be laggy). Download and unzip "DroughtRoyaleTestBuilds.zip" (located at the bottom of the page)   to try a version for Windows and Mac. 

Controls:

A/D - Walk

Space - Jump

E/G - Pickup/Drop - Pickup Guns/Grenades

Q - Use Healthpacks - Walk into health packs to pick them up

Right-Click - Use Shield

Left-Click - Fire (if holding weapon)

M - open map

Created by Dalton Hutchinson, Giovanny Ospina, Josh Shoenfelt and Dustin Marino
